metadata.title: CVE-2020-15005 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In MediaWiki before 1.31.8, 1.32.x and 1.33.x before 1.33.4, and 1.34.x before 1.34.2, private wikis behind a caching server using the img_auth.php image authorization security feature may have had their files cached publicly, so any unauthorized user could view them. This occurs because Cache-Control and Vary headers were mishandled.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.8-1').
